mapper.insert: insert into paper_team ( paper_id, user_id, user_role, contribution ) values ( #{paper_id}, #{user_id}, #{user_role}, #{contribution} )
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_name name,u.department_id department_id, t.role_id role_id, t.contribution contribution FROM user u, paper p, paper_team t WHERE p.paper_id = #{paper_id} and p.paper_id = t.paper_id and t.user_id = u.user_id
